title: riot gave talon TOO much counterplay, as well as his fare share of bugs
body:
maybe im just a salty silver, but im pretty sure riot gutted talons mid game and pick/teamfight.assassination time of the game. they did give him an easier time winning lane but heres the thing. solo q nroms im pretty sure frm my experience gives each team one good player and 4 trash scrubs. so lets say i win lane, but both feeds 5 kills before lvl 6 to vayne.knowing ill get counter ganked or simply oneshotted i opt to roam top and help irelia that is struggling with riven, and vayne reahes 20 kills. as old talon, onsidering i was fed or not behind i could assassinate her witha high succesrate. but this talpon has ah ard time dealing with mobility like ezreal and vayne. he has to rely on his passive to kill soeone , with w being very unreliable to land, and it taking a few seconds to get procs. this isnt even taking into factor the tanks and cc. even full ad riven would have a better chance of assassinating an adc as of now. also i dont see why such a high damage adc needs a mobility AND stealth. as there is no pink wards, scrying doenst let u target wich is relied on for burst, even full ap vel would have a better channce of killing vayne faster than u. whereeas if u were fed as the old talon, killing vayne was a simple matter of jumping on her, dealing all her hp and most of her teams hp in 2 secs.

spent too much whining about that anyways there a bugs that need to be fixed, such as skillshots that hit talon where he was when starting parkour id parkour will connect, he simply falling off, vayne e hitting him in the last frames of parkour freezing him and moving him back to die, the worst oen that often seals my fate is his ultiately randomly or after q too soon simply not giviing invisibilty,leaving u perfectly targetable, visible and ready to die.

what soulutions would i offer? well first of all if ur going to give second w a dely and take away the slow from the first one, i think the first w should come out really fast, wich would make it easier to land and balnce it out. there should also be a momentum mechanic, where u can q during parkour off a wall and it gains bonus range. and ulti does no dmg nowadays, also its unfair for u to be able to cancel invisibilty without blades returning for dmg

this one might sound a bit far fetched, but i think he should have a hard cc thts needs conditions that are difficult to meet or an item where if u do x percentage of champs health in 2 seconds, ur next basic attack stuns(this would probably be cancer but you never know lol)
